long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Zune Software  allows to enjoy Zune Marketplace content on their PC as well as load media content to Zune capable devices

Zune Software is available in the chrome web store, just install it and learn how you use it.

This Extension is Developed for Zune Users and this extension is a Guide extension.

How To Download:-

1. Firstly click on Add To Chrome button.
2. after download just click on Extension icon.
3. then you see Guided Area.
4. Thanks :)
